name: Pat and Pete - Professional Potion Pilferers
name_original: Pat and Pete - Professional Potion Pilferers
description:
Pat has broken into the wizard's tower to steal some potions.  He's tossing them down to Pete, who must catch them.  Drop too many and the heist is done.  Watch out for the skulls!

The controls are simple: 

  • Enter to begin. 
  • Left and right arrow keys to move. 
  • R to restart.
